entry.content:
æµè§ˆå™¨ç½‘é¡µå¯ä»¥å¾ˆæ–¹ä¾¿çš„ä½¿ç”¨ postmessage ä¸ Chrome æ‰©å±•é€šè®¯ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯ postmessage åªèƒ½ä¼ é€’æ¶ˆæ¯ï¼Œä¸èƒ½ä¼ é€’ promiseï¼Œå¦‚æœé‡åˆ°ç½‘é¡µéœ€è¦ç­‰å¾… Chrome æ‰©å±•è¿”å›çš„ promiseï¼Œå¤„ç†èµ·æ¥å°±æ¯”è¾ƒéº»çƒ¦äº†ã€‚

ç°åœ¨å¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡å°è£… postmessage å‘é€æ¶ˆæ¯ å’Œ ç›‘å¬ message æ¥æ”¶æ¶ˆæ¯ï¼Œç„¶åç›´æ¥è¿”å› promiseï¼Œè¿™ä¸‹å°±æ–¹ä¾¿å¤šäº†ã€‚

ç½‘é¡µå‘é€å¹¶æ¥æ”¶ promise æ¶ˆæ¯â€‹

<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8" />
    <title>test chrome extension</title>
  </head>

  <body>
    <div id="btns">
      <button class="install">æµ‹è¯•å‘é€å¹¶æ¥æ”¶æ¶ˆæ¯</button>
    </div>

    <script>
      async function waitForPostMessage({
        timeout = 5000,
        type,
        data = {},
        lang,
      }) {
        const returnType = `RETURN_${type}`;
        let timeoutId = null;

        window.postMessage({
          type: type,
          data: { ...data, timeout, lang },
        });

        const timeoutPromise = new Promise((_, reject) => {
          setTimeout(() => {
            reject(new Error("timeout"));
          }, timeout);
        });

        const responsePromise = new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
          function handleMessage(event) {
            timeoutId = setTimeout(() => {
              console.log("removeEventListener");
              window.removeEventListener("message", handleMessage);
            }, timeout);

            const messageData = event?.data;
            console.log("ğŸš€ ~ handleMessage ~ messageData:", messageData);

            if (messageData?.type !== returnType) {
              return;
            }

            if (messageData && messageData.type === returnType) {
              resolve(messageData);
            } else {
              reject(new Error("No data received in message"));
            }

            clearTimeout(timeoutId);
            window.removeEventListener("message", handleMessage);
          }

          window.addEventListener("message", handleMessage);
        });

        return await Promise.race([responsePromise, timeoutPromise]);
      }

      document
        .querySelector("#btns")
        .addEventListener("click", async (event) => {
          // æ£€æµ‹å®‰è£…åŠGoogle å¯ç”¨æ€§
          if (event.target.matches(".install")) {
            waitForPostMessage({
              type: "GLARITY_PING_URL",
              timeout: 2000,
            })
              .then((data) => {
                console.log("Received message data:", data?.data);
              })
              .catch((error) => {
                console.error("Failed to receive message:", error);
              });
          }
        });
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

Chrome æ‰©å±•æ¥æ”¶å¹¶å‘é€æ¶ˆæ¯â€‹

content-script.jsâ€‹

// content-script.js
window.addEventListener("message", async (message) => {
  const messageData = message.data || {};

  const { type, data = {} } = messageData;

  switch (type) {
    case "GLARITY_PING_URL": {
      const res = await Browser.runtime.sendMessage({
        type: "PING_URL",
        data: data,
      });

      window.postMessage({ type: "RETURN_GLARITY_PING_URL", data: res });

      break;
    }

    default:
      break;
  }
});

background.jsâ€‹

// background.js
chrome.runtime.onMessage.addListener((request, sender) => {
  if (request.type === "PING_URL") {
    const { url = "https://google.com/", timeout } = request.data || {};

    return fetch(url)
      .then((res) => {
        return { ok: res?.ok };
      })
      .catch(() => {
        return { ok: false };
      });
  }
});

ç»§æ‰¿â€‹

1. ç»„åˆç»§æ‰¿â€‹

/**

 * ä½¿ç”¨åŸå‹é“¾å®ç°å¯¹åŸå‹å±æ€§å’Œæ–¹æ³•çš„ç»§æ‰¿ã€‚
 * å€Ÿç”¨æ„é€ å‡½æ•°æ¥å®ç°å¯¹å®ä¾‹å±æ€§çš„ç»§æ‰¿ã€‚
 */
function SuperType(name) {
  this.name = name;
  this.colors = ["red", "blue", "green"];
}

SuperType.prototype.sayName = function () {
  console.log(this.name);
};

function SubType(name, age) {
  // ç»§æ‰¿å±æ€§
  SuperType.call(this, name);

  this.age = age;
}

// ç»§æ‰¿æ–¹æ³•
SubType.prototype = new SuperType();
SubType.prototype.constructor = SubType; //å¢å¼ºå¯¹è±¡
SubType.prototype.sayAge = function () {
  console.log(this.age);
};

console.warn("ç»„åˆç»§æ‰¿");
let instance1 = new SubType("TB", 20);

let instance2 = new SubType("JD", 15);

instance2.sayName(); // JD

2. Object.create() ç»§æ‰¿â€‹

Object.create() åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªæ–°å¯¹è±¡ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨ç°æœ‰çš„å¯¹è±¡æ¥æä¾›æ–°åˆ›å»ºçš„å¯¹è±¡çš„protoã€‚ https://developer.mozilla.org/zh-CN/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object/create

/**

function SuperCar(name) {

  • class å£°æ˜åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªåŸºäºåŸå‹ç»§æ‰¿çš„å…·æœ‰ç»™å®šåç§°çš„æ–°ç±»ã€‚ https://developer.mozilla.org/zh-CN/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Statements/class
  • extends å…³é”®å­—ç”¨äºç±»å£°æ˜æˆ–è€…ç±»è¡¨è¾¾å¼ä¸­ï¼Œä»¥åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªç±»ï¼Œè¯¥ç±»æ˜¯å¦ä¸€ä¸ªç±»çš„å­ç±»ã€‚ https://developer.mozilla.org/zh-CN/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Classes/extends
/**
 * 3. class & extendsç»§æ‰¿
 * class å£°æ˜åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªåŸºäºåŸå‹ç»§æ‰¿çš„å…·æœ‰ç»™å®šåç§°çš„æ–°ç±»ã€‚
 * @see https://developer.mozilla.org/zh-CN/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Statements/class
 * extends å…³é”®å­—ç”¨äºç±»å£°æ˜æˆ–è€…ç±»è¡¨è¾¾å¼ä¸­ï¼Œä»¥åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªç±»ï¼Œè¯¥ç±»æ˜¯å¦ä¸€ä¸ªç±»çš„å­ç±»ã€‚
 * @see https://developer.mozilla.org/zh-CN/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Classes/extends

class SuperPen {

entry.title: åˆæ‹äº‘ Node.js å®ç°æ–‡ä»¶ä¸Šä¼ ã€åˆ é™¤
entry.content:
Node.js æœåŠ¡ç«¯â€‹

ä½¿ç”¨ Node.js + Express.js å®ç° æœåŠ¡ç«¯â€‹

const express = require("express");
const app = express();
const axios = require("axios");

app.set("port", process.env.PORT || 8082);

// é™æ€èµ„æºç›®å½•ï¼Œè¿™é‡Œæ”¾åœ¨äº†æ ¹ç›®å½•ï¼Œç”Ÿäº§ç¯å¢ƒä¸å…è®¸è¿™æ ·
app.use(express.static(__dirname));

// å¯åŠ¨ä¸€ä¸ªç«¯å£ä¸º 8082 çš„æœåŠ¡å™¨
app.listen(app.get("port"), () => {
  console.log("http://localhost:" + app.get("port"));
});

å‡†å¤‡ Base64ã€HMAC-SHA1ã€MD5 å®ç°ç­¾åè®¤è¯â€‹

è¯¦è§ï¼šhttp://docs.upyun.com/api/authorization/#_5

const crypto = require("crypto");

// MD5
function MD5(value) {
  return crypto.createHash("md5").update(value).digest("hex");
}

// Base64
function base64(value) {
  return Buffer.from(value).toString("base64");
}

// hmacsha1
function hmacsha1(secret, value) {
  return crypto
    .createHmac("sha1", secret)
    .update(value, "utf-8")
    .digest()
    .toString("base64");
}

ä¸Šä¼ ã€åˆ é™¤æ¥å£â€‹

const date = new Date().toGMTString();
const bucketname = ""; // ç©ºé—´å
const key = ""; // æ“ä½œå‘˜
const secret = ""; // å¯†ç 
const upyunUrl = "http://v0.api.upyun.com/";

// Upload
app.get("/api/token/upload", (req, res) => {
  let fileName = (Math.random() * 100000000) >>> 0;
  let expiration = ((Date.now() / 1000) >>> 0) + 30 * 60; // è¯·æ±‚çš„è¿‡æœŸæ—¶é—´ï¼ŒUNIX UTC æ—¶é—´æˆ³ï¼Œå•ä½ç§’ã€‚å»ºè®®è®¾ä¸º 30 åˆ†é’Ÿ http://docs.upyun.com/api/form_api/
  let method = "POST";

  let policy = base64(
    JSON.stringify({
      bucket: bucketname,
      // "save-key": "/" + fileName + "{.suffix}",
      "save-key": "/{filename}{.suffix}",
      expiration: expiration,
    })
  );

  let authorization =
    "UPYUN " +
    key +
    ":" +
    hmacsha1(MD5(secret), method + "&/" + bucketname + "&" + policy);

  res.json({
    msg: "OK",
    code: 200,
    data: {
      authorization: authorization,
      policy: policy,
    },
  });
});

// Delete
app.get("/api/token/del", (req, res) => {
  let item = req.query.item;
  let method = "DELETE";
  let authorization =
    "UPYUN " +
    key +
    ":" +
    hmacsha1(MD5(secret), method + "&/" + bucketname + item + "&" + date);

  axios({
    url: upyunUrl + bucketname + item,
    method: "DELETE",
    headers: {
      Authorization: authorization,
      Date: date,
    },
  })
    .then((response) => {
      res.json({
        msg: "OK",
        code: 200,
        data: {},
      });
    })
    .catch((err) => {
      console.log("err", err);
    });
});

è·¨åŸŸæ¥å£è°ƒç”¨â€‹

const cors = require("cors");

// CORS @see https://github.com/expressjs/cors
app.use(cors());

å‰ç«¯â€‹

å‰ç«¯ä½¿ç”¨ Vue.js å®ç°

å¼•å…¥ Bootstrap.cssâ€‹

<link
  rel="stylesheet"
  type="text/css"
  href="https://unpkg.com/bootstrap@4.1.3/dist/css/bootstrap.css"
/>
<script src="https://unpkg.com/axios/dist/axios.min.js"></script>
<!-- HTML -->
<div id="app">
  <div class="card" style="margin: 50px auto; width: 300px;">
    <div class="card-body">
      <h5 class="card-title">UPYun Upload & Delete</h5>
      <div class="card-text">
        <div class="form-group">
          <label for="file">Upload</label>
          <input
            type="file"
            id="file"
            class="form-control-file"
            @change="onChange"
          />
          <div class="form-text text-muted">
            <ul>
              <li v-for="(item, index) in files">
                {{item}}
                <a href="javascript:;" @click="onDel(item, index)">Del</a>
              </li>
            </ul>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

å¼•å…¥ Vue.jsã€Axiosâ€‹

<script src="https://unpkg.com/vue@2.5.17/dist/vue.js"></script>
<script src="https://unpkg.com/axios/dist/axios.min.js"></script>

JSâ€‹

const upUrl = "http://v0.api.upyun.com/"; // +ç©ºé—´åï¼Œå¦‚ï¼šhttp://v0.api.upyun.com/yun-temp
const baseApi = "http://localhost:8082/api/";
let uploadInput;

let app = new Vue({
  el: "#app",
  data: {
    files: [],
  },
  methods: {
    onChange: function () {
      getToken((token) => {
        let formData = new FormData();
        formData.append("file", uploadInput.files[0]);
        formData.append("policy", token.policy);
        formData.append("authorization", token.authorization);

        axios({
          method: "POST",
          url: upUrl,
          data: formData,
        })
          .then((res) => {
            res = res || {};

            if (res.status !== 200) {
              console.log("error");
              return;
            }

            let data = res.data || {};
            this.files.push(data.url);
            alert("Success");
          })
          .catch((err) => {
            console.log(err);
          });
      });
    },
    onDel: function (item, index) {
      this.files.splice(index, 1);
      axios
        .request({
          url: baseApi + "token/del",
          method: "GET",
          params: {
            item: encodeURI(item),
          },
        })
        .then((res) => {
          alert("Deleted.");
        })
        .catch((err) => {
          console.log(err);
        });
    },
  },
  mounted() {
    uploadInput = $("file");
  },
});

// DOM è·å–å…ƒç´ 
function $(el) {
  return document.getElementById(el);
}

// è·å– token
function getToken(fn) {
  let token = window.localStorage.getItem("token");
  token = JSON.parse(token) || {};
  let nowTime = Date.now();

  if (nowTime < token.expired && token.authorization && token.policy) {
    fn(token);
    return;
  }

  axios({
    method: "get",
    url: baseApi + "token/upload",
  }).then((res) => {
    let data = res.data || {};
    data = data.data || {};
    const authorization = data.authorization;
    const policy = data.policy;
    const expired = ((Date.now() / 1000) >>> 0) + 30 * 60;

    token = {
      authorization,
      policy,
      expired,
    };

    fn(token);
    window.localStorage.setItem("token", JSON.stringify(token));
  });
}

æœ‰äº†å›¢é˜Ÿçš„ UI ç»„ä»¶åº“å°±å°‘ä¸äº†ä½¿ç”¨æ–‡æ¡£ï¼Œæ¯•ç«Ÿæ–‡æ¡£è¿˜æ˜¯æ¯”å£å£ç›¸ä¼ è¦é è°±çš„å¤šã€‚è¿™é‡Œä»‹ç»ä¸€ä¸ªå¯ä»¥å¿«é€Ÿåˆ›å»º React UI ç»„ä»¶åº“ä½¿ç”¨ã€æ¼”ç¤ºæ–‡æ¡£çš„é¡¹ç›®ï¼šDoczã€‚Docz çš„ç‰¹è‰²æ˜¯é›¶é…ç½®ã€ç®€å•ã€å¿«é€Ÿï¼Œå®ƒä½¿ç”¨ Markdown è¯­æ³•çš„æ‰©å±• MDX (åœ¨ Markdown é‡Œå¼•å…¥ React ç»„ä»¶å¹¶æ¸²æŸ“å‡ºç»„ä»¶)æ¥ä¹¦å†™æ–‡æ¡£ï¼Œå¯¹äºç†Ÿæ‚‰ Markdown çš„å¼€å‘è€…æ˜¯å¯ä»¥ç›´æ¥ä¸Šæ‰‹çš„ã€‚ä¸‹é¢è´´ä¸€å¼ å®˜æ–¹çš„å›¾çœ‹çœ‹æœ‰å¤šç®€å•ï¼š

entry.title: æ›´ä¼˜é›…çš„æ–¹å¼ï¼š JavaScript ä¸­é¡ºåºæ‰§è¡Œå¼‚æ­¥å‡½æ•°
entry.content:

1995 å¹´ï¼Œå½“æ—¶æœ€æµè¡Œçš„æµè§ˆå™¨â€”â€”ç½‘æ™¯ä¸­å¼€å§‹è¿è¡Œ JavaScript ï¼ˆæœ€åˆç§°ä¸º LiveScriptï¼‰ã€‚ 1996 å¹´ï¼Œå¾®è½¯å‘å¸ƒäº† JScript å…¼å®¹ JavaScriptã€‚éšç€ç½‘æ™¯ã€å¾®è½¯ç«äº‰è€Œä¸æ–­çš„æŠ€æœ¯æ›´æ–°ï¼Œåœ¨ 2000 å¹´å‰åï¼ŒJavaScript ç›¸å…³çš„æŠ€æœ¯åŸºç¡€å‡†å¤‡å°±ç»ªã€‚ éšååˆ° 2005 å¹´å‰åï¼Œä»¥ Google ä¸ºé¦–å¼€å§‹é‡è§†ä½¿ç”¨ AJAXï¼ˆå³ Asynchronous JavaScript and XML)ï¼Œä½¿å¾—å¤æ‚çš„ç½‘é¡µäº¤äº’ä½“éªŒæ¥è¿‘æ¡Œé¢åº”ç”¨ã€‚

ç„¶åï¼Œéšç€ Web åº”ç”¨å˜å¾—è¶Šæ¥è¶Šå¤æ‚ ï¼ŒJavaScript çš„ç”Ÿæ€å’Œé‡è¦æ€§ä¹Ÿæ—¥ç›Šæå‡ï¼ŒYUIã€prototype.jsã€jQuery ç­‰å„ç§åº“ç›¸åº”ç™»åœºï¼Œéšä¹‹è€Œæ¥å°±åˆ°äº† JavaScript çš„ç¹è£æœŸã€‚

2008 å¹´ï¼ŒGoogle å‘å¸ƒäº† JavaScript å¼•æ“ V8 å¤§å¤§æ”¹å–„äº† JavaScript çš„æ‰§è¡Œé€Ÿåº¦ï¼Œè¿›ä¸€æ­¥æ¨åŠ¨äº† JavaScript çš„ç¹è£ï¼Œä¹Ÿä¸º JavaScript è¿›å†›æœåŠ¡å™¨ç«¯æ‰“ä¸‹äº†åŸºç¡€ï¼ˆå¦‚ï¼šNode.jsï¼‰ã€‚

é¡ºåºæ‰§è¡Œå¼‚æ­¥å‡½æ•°â€‹

å¼‚æ­¥ä¸º JavaScript å¸¦æ¥éé˜»å¡ç­‰ä¼˜åŠ¿çš„åŒæ—¶ï¼ŒåŒæ—¶ä¹Ÿåœ¨ä¸€äº›åœºæ™¯ä¸‹å¸¦äº†ä¸ä¾¿ï¼Œå¦‚ï¼šé¡ºåºæ‰§è¡Œå¼‚æ­¥å‡½æ•°ï¼Œä¸‹é¢æ€»ç»“äº†ä¸€äº›å¸¸ç”¨çš„æ–¹æ³•ã€‚

1. "å›è°ƒåœ°ç‹±"â€‹

éšç€åº”ç”¨å¤æ‚åº¦å‡ ä½•å¼å¢åŠ ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å¯èƒ½é‡åˆ°ä¸‹é¢â€œå›è°ƒåœ°ç‹±â€å¼çš„ä»£ç ã€‚

// ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªä»»åŠ¡
function task1(callback) {
  setTimeout(() => {
    console.log("1", "æˆ‘æ˜¯ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªä»»åŠ¡ï¼Œå¿…é¡»ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªæ‰§è¡Œ");
    callback && callback(1);
  }, 3000);
}

// ç¬¬äºŒä¸ªä»»åŠ¡
function task2(callback) {
  setTimeout(() => {
    console.log("2", "æˆ‘æ˜¯ç¬¬äºŒä¸ªä»»åŠ¡");
    callback && callback(2);
  }, 1000);
}

// ç¬¬ä¸‰ä¸ªä»»åŠ¡
function task3(callback) {
  setTimeout(() => {
    console.log("3", "æˆ‘æ˜¯ç¬¬ä¸‰ä¸ªä»»åŠ¡");
    callback && callback(3);
  }, 1000);
}

// æ‰€æœ‰ä»»åŠ¡
function allTasks() {
  task1((cb1) => {
    if (cb1) {
      task2((cb2) => {
        if (cb2) {
          task3((cb3) => {
            if (cb3) {
              // é¡ºåºå®Œæˆæ‰€æœ‰ä»»åŠ¡
            }
          });
        }

}

/**
 * 3ç§’å
 * 1 æˆ‘æ˜¯ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªä»»åŠ¡ï¼Œå¿…é¡»ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªæ‰§è¡Œ
 * 1ç§’å

2. Promiseâ€‹

ä¸ºäº†é¿å…â€œå›è°ƒåœ°ç‹±â€å¸¦æ¥çš„å¤æ‚æ€§å’Œä¸æ˜“é˜…è¯»ï¼ŒES6 æ¨å‡ºäº† Promiseã€‚è¿™æ¬¡å®ç°èµ·æ¥ç®€å•å¤šäº†ï¼Œä½†è¿˜å­˜åœ¨ Promise ä¸­åµŒå¥—å¤šå±‚ Promise çš„é—®é¢˜ï¼Œä¼¼ä¹åˆå›åˆ°äº†ç±»ä¼¼â€œå›è°ƒåœ°ç‹±â€çš„é—®é¢˜ä¸Šã€‚

new Promise((resolve) => {

    console.log("1", "æˆ‘æ˜¯ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªä»»åŠ¡ï¼Œå¿…é¡»ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªæ‰§è¡Œ");

      console.log("2", "æˆ‘æ˜¯ç¬¬äºŒä¸ªä»»åŠ¡");

/**
 * 3ç§’å
 * 1 æˆ‘æ˜¯ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªä»»åŠ¡ï¼Œå¿…é¡»ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªæ‰§è¡Œ

 */

3. Awaitã€Asyncâ€‹

ç¡®ä¿æ”¯æŒï¼Œè¯¦ç»†è§ï¼šhttps://caniuse.com/#search=async

  • https://developer.mozilla.org/zh-CN/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Statements/async_function

ä¸ºäº†æ›´æ˜“ä¹¦å†™å’Œé˜…è¯»æ¥å®ç°é¡ºåºæ‰§è¡Œå¼‚æ­¥å‡½æ•°ï¼ŒES2017 æ–°å¢äº† await å’Œ asyncã€‚è¿™æ¬¡ä¹¦å†™ä½“éªŒéå¸¸çš„æ£’ï¼Œå°±åƒå†™åŒæ­¥ä»£ç ä¸€æ ·å®Œæˆäº†é¡ºåºæ‰§è¡Œå¼‚æ­¥çš„éœ€æ±‚ã€‚

/**
 * ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªä»»åŠ¡
 */
function task1() {
  return new Promise((resolve) => {
    setTimeout(() => {
      console.log("1", "æˆ‘æ˜¯ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªä»»åŠ¡ï¼Œå¿…é¡»ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªæ‰§è¡Œ");
      resolve("done");

/**

function task2() {

/**

/**

/**

/**

entry.title: JavaScript æ’åºç®—æ³•ï¼ˆJavaScript sorting algorithmsï¼‰
entry.content:
åŸºç¡€æ„é€ å‡½æ•°â€‹

ä»¥ä¸‹å‡ ç§æ’åºç®—æ³•åšä¸ºæ–¹æ³•æ”¾åœ¨æ„é€ å‡½æ•°é‡Œã€‚

function ArrayList() {
  var array = [];

  // äº¤æ¢ä½ç½®
  var swap = function (index1, index2) {
    var aux = array[index1];
    array[index1] = array[index2];
    array[index2] = aux;
  };

  this.insert = function (item) {
    array.push(item);
  };

  this.toString = function () {
    return array.join();
  };

  this.val = function () {
    return array;
  };

  // å†’æ³¡æ’åº
  this.bubbleSort = function () {
    //etc
  };
}

1. å†’æ³¡æ’åºâ€‹

å†’æ³¡æ’åºæ¯”è¾ƒä»»ä½•ä¸¤ä¸ªç›¸é‚»çš„é¡¹ï¼Œå¦‚æœç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªæ¯”ç¬¬äºŒä¸ªå¤§ï¼Œåˆ™äº¤æ¢å®ƒä»¬ã€‚

å¤æ‚åº¦ O(n^2)ã€‚

ä»£ç â€‹

this.bubbleSort = function () {
  console.time("Bubble Sort");
  var length = array.length;
  for (var i = 0; i < length; i++) {
    for (var j = 0; j < length - 1 - i; j++) {
      if (array[j] > array[j + 1]) {
        swap(j, j + 1);
      }
    }
  }
  console.timeEnd("Bubble Sort");
};

å›¾è§£â€‹

2. é€‰æ‹©æ’åºâ€‹

é€‰æ‹©æ’åºç®—æ³•æ˜¯ä¸€ç§åŸå€æ¯”è¾ƒæ’åºç®—æ³•ã€‚é€‰æ‹©æ’åºå¤§è‡´çš„æ€è·¯æ˜¯æ‰¾åˆ°æ•°æ®ç»“æ„ä¸­çš„æœ€å°å€¼å¹¶å°†å…¶æ”¾ç½®åœ¨ç¬¬ä¸€ä½ï¼Œæ¥ç€æ‰¾åˆ°ç¬¬äºŒå°çš„å€¼å¹¶å°†å…¶æ”¾åœ¨ç¬¬äºŒä½ï¼Œä»¥æ­¤ç±»æ¨ã€‚

å¤æ‚åº¦ï¼šO(n^2)ã€‚

ä»£ç â€‹

this.selectionSort = function () {
  console.time("selectionSort");
  var length = array.length,
    indexMin;

  for (var i = 0; i < length - 1; i++) {
    indexMin = i;
    for (var j = i; j < length; j++) {
      if (array[indexMin] > array[j]) {
        indexMin = j;
      }
    }

    if (i !== indexMin) {
      swap(i, indexMin);
    }
  }
  console.timeEnd("selectionSort");
};

å›¾è§£â€‹

3. æ’å…¥æ’åºâ€‹

æ’å…¥æ’åºæ¯æ¬¡æ’ä¸€ä¸ªæ•°ç»„é¡¹ï¼Œä»¥æ­¤æ–¹å¼æ„å»ºæœ€åçš„æ’åºæ•°ç»„ã€‚å‡å®šç¬¬ä¸€é¡¹å·²ç»æ’åºäº†ï¼Œæ¥ç€ï¼Œå®ƒå’Œç¬¬äºŒé¡¹è¿›è¡Œæ¯”è¾ƒï¼Œç¬¬äºŒé¡¹æ˜¯åº”è¯¥å¾…åœ¨åŸä½è¿˜æ˜¯æ’åˆ°ç¬¬ä¸€é¡¹ä¹‹å‰å‘¢ï¼Ÿè¿™æ ·ï¼Œå¤´ä¸¤é¡¹å°±å·²æ­£ç¡®æ’åºï¼Œæ¥ç€å’Œç¬¬ä¸‰é¡¹æ¯”è¾ƒï¼ˆå®ƒæ˜¯è¯¥æ’å…¥åˆ°ç¬¬ä¸€ã€ç¬¬äºŒè¿˜æ˜¯ç¬¬ä¸‰çš„ä½ç½®å‘¢ï¼Ÿï¼‰ï¼Œä»¥æ­¤ç±»æ¨ã€‚

æ’åºå°å‹æ•°ç»„æ—¶ï¼Œæ­¤ç®—æ³•æ¯”é€‰æ‹©æ’åºå’Œå†’æ³¡æ’åºæ€§èƒ½è¦å¥½ã€‚

ä»£ç â€‹

this.insertionSort = function () {
  console.time("insertionSort");
  var length = array.length,
    j,
    temp;

  for (var i = 1; i < length; i++) {
    j = i;
    temp = array[i];
    while (j > 0 && array[j - 1] > temp) {
      array[j] = array[j - 1];
      j--;
    }
    array[j] = temp;
  }
  console.timeEnd("insertionSort");
};

å›¾è§£â€‹

4. å½’å¹¶æ’åºâ€‹

å½’å¹¶æ’åºæ˜¯ä¸€ç§åˆ†æ²»ç®—æ³•ã€‚å…¶æ€æƒ³æ˜¯å°†åŸå§‹æ•°ç»„åˆ‡åˆ†æˆè¾ƒå°çš„æ•°ç»„ï¼Œç›´åˆ°æ¯ä¸ªå°æ•°ç»„åªæœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªä½ç½®ï¼Œæ¥ç€å°†å°æ•°ç»„å½’å¹¶æˆè¾ƒå¤§çš„æ•°ç»„ï¼Œç›´åˆ°æœ€ååªæœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªæ’åºå®Œæ¯•çš„å¤§æ•°ç»„ã€‚

å¤æ‚åº¦ï¼šO(n log^n)ã€‚

ä»£ç â€‹

this.mergeSort = function () {
  console.time("mergeSort");
  array = mergeSortRec(array);
  console.timeEnd("mergeSort");
};
var mergeSortRec = function (array) {
  var length = array.length;
  if (length === 1) {
    return array;
  }

  var mid = Math.floor(length / 2),
    left = array.slice(0, mid),
    right = array.slice(mid, length);

  return merge(mergeSortRec(left), mergeSortRec(right));
};
var merge = function (left, right) {
  var result = [],
    il = 0,
    ir = 0;

  while (il < left.length && ir < right.length) {
    if (left[il] < right[ir]) {
      result.push(left[il++]);
    } else {
      result.push(right[ir++]);
    }
  }

  while (il < left.length) {
    result.push(left[il++]);
  }

  while (ir < right.length) {
    result.push(right[ir++]);
  }

  return result;
};

å›¾è§£â€‹

5. å¿«é€Ÿæ’åºâ€‹

å½’å¹¶æ’åºä¸€æ ·ï¼Œå¿«é€Ÿæ’åºä¹Ÿä½¿ç”¨åˆ†æ²»çš„æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œå°†åŸå§‹æ•°ç»„åˆ†ä¸ºè¾ƒå°çš„æ•°ç»„ï¼ˆä½†å®ƒæ²¡æœ‰åƒå½’å¹¶æ’åºé‚£æ ·å°†å®ƒä»¬åˆ†å‰²å¼€ï¼‰ã€‚

å®ƒçš„æ€§èƒ½é€šå¸¸æ¯”å…¶ä»–çš„å¤æ‚åº¦ä¸º O(n log^n)çš„æ’åºç®—æ³•è¦å¥½ã€‚

å¤æ‚åº¦ï¼šO(n log^n)ã€‚

ä»£ç â€‹

this.quickSort = function () {
  console.time("quickSort");
  quick(array, 0, array.length - 1);
  console.timeEnd("quickSort");
};

var quick = function (array, left, right) {
  var index;
  if (array.length > 1) {
    index = partition(array, left, right);

    if (left < index - 1) {
      quick(array, left, index - 1);
    }

    if (index < right) {
      quick(array, index, right);
    }
  }
};

// åˆ’åˆ†è¿‡ç¨‹
var partition = function (array, left, right) {
  var pivot = array[Math.floor((right + left) / 2)],
    i = left,
    j = right;

  while (i < j) {
    while (array[i] < pivot) {
      i++;
    }

    while (array[j] > pivot) {
      j--;
    }

    if (i <= j) {
      swapQuickSort(array, i, j);
      i++;
      j--;
    }
  }
  return i;
};

var swapQuickSort = function (array, index1, index2) {
  var aux = array[index1];
  array[index1] = array[index2];
  array[index2] = aux;
};

å›¾è§£â€‹

6. ECMAScript æ’åºâ€‹

ECMAScript æ²¡æœ‰å®šä¹‰ç”¨å“ªä¸ªæ’åºç®—æ³•ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥æµè§ˆå™¨å‚å•†å¯ä»¥è‡ªè¡Œå»å®ç°ç®—æ³•ã€‚ä¾‹å¦‚ï¼ŒMozilla Firefox ä½¿ç”¨å½’å¹¶æ’åºä½œä¸º Array.prototype.sort çš„å®ç°ï¼Œè€Œ Chrome ä½¿ç”¨äº†ä¸€ä¸ªå¿«é€Ÿæ’åºï¼ˆä¸‹é¢æˆ‘ä»¬ä¼šå­¦ä¹ çš„ï¼‰çš„å˜ä½“ã€‚

this.esSort = function () {
  console.time("esSort");
  var tempArray = [];
  tempArray = array.sort(function (a, b) {
    return a - b;
  });
  console.timeEnd("esSort");
  return tempArray;
};

æ€§èƒ½æµ‹è¯•â€‹

ç¯å¢ƒâ€‹

  • OSï¼šWIN10 64 ä½

  • æµè§ˆå™¨ï¼šGoogle Chrome 60.0.3112.78

ä»£ç â€‹

/**
 * åˆ›å»ºéšæœºæ•°ç»„
 * @param  {[type]} size [description]
 * @return {[type]}      [description]
 */
function createNonSortedArray(size) {
  var array = new ArrayList();
  for (var i = size; i > 0; i--) {
    var tempNum = (Math.random() * i) >>> 0;
    array.insert(tempNum);
  }
  return array;
}

// å†’æ³¡æ’åº
(function () {
  var array = createNonSortedArray(500);
  array.bubbleSort(); // Bubble Sort: 2.625ms
  console.log(array.val());
})();

// é€‰æ‹©æ’åº
(function () {

  console.log(array.val());
})();

// æ’å…¥æ’åº
(function () {
  var array = createNonSortedArray(500);
  array.insertionSort(); // insertionSort: 1.825927734375ms
  console.log(array.val());
})();

// å½’å¹¶æ’åº
(function () {
  var array = createNonSortedArray(500);
  array.mergeSort(); // mergeSort: 0.76416015625ms
  console.log(array.val());
})();

// å¿«é€Ÿæ’åº
(function () {
  var array = createNonSortedArray(500);
  array.quickSort(); // quickSort: 0.39111328125ms
  console.log(array.val());
})();

// ESæ’åº
(function () {
  var array = createNonSortedArray(500);
  array.esSort(); // esSort: 0.34130859375ms
  console.log(array.val());
})();

ç”±æ­¤å¯è§ï¼Œä¸€èˆ¬æƒ…å†µæˆ‘ä»¬åªéœ€è¦ä½¿ç”¨JavaScript æä¾›çš„ Array.prototype.sort() æ–¹æ³•å³å¯ï¼Œæµè§ˆå™¨ï¼ˆæˆ–å®¿ä¸»ç¯å¢ƒï¼‰ä¼šåœ¨åº•å±‚é‡‡ç”¨æœ€ä¼˜ç®—æ³•å¸®æˆ‘ä»¬å®ç°æ’åºã€‚

æ¥æº/å‚è€ƒâ€‹

entry.title: JavaScript addEventListener ç¬¬ä¸‰ä¸ªå‚æ•°
entry.content:
å…ˆçœ‹ä¸€ä¸ªå®Œæ•´çš„æ¼”ç¤ºé¡µé¢ä»£ç ã€‚

Codeâ€‹

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="zh-CN">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta
      name="viewport"
      content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1, maximum-scale=1, user-scalable=no"
    />
    <title>JavaScript addEventListener</title>
    <style>
      .header-container ul {
        padding: 40px;
        background-color: #eee;
      }
      .header-container li {
        padding: 20px;
        background-color: yellow;
      }
    </style>
  </head>
  <body>
    <header class="header-container" id="header">
      <nav>
        <ul>
          <li><a href="#">nav ul li a</a></li>
        </ul>
      </nav>
    </header>
    <script>
      const header = document.getElementById("header"),
        ul = header.querySelector("ul"),
        li = header.querySelector("li"),
        useCapture = true;
      ul.addEventListener(
        "click",
        function () {
          console.log(useCapture, "ul");
        },
        useCapture
      );
      li.addEventListener(
        "click",
        function () {
          console.log(useCapture, "li");
        },
        useCapture
      );
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

ç»“æœâ€‹

1. useCapture: falseï¼ˆé»˜è®¤å€¼ä¹Ÿæ˜¯ falseï¼‰â€‹

è¾“å‡ºï¼š

true "ul"
true "li"

2. useCapture: trueâ€‹

è¾“å‡ºï¼š

true "li"
true "ul"

è¯­æ³•â€‹

MDNï¼ˆMozilla Developer Networkï¼‰â€‹

useCapture å¯é€‰ Booleanï¼Œæ˜¯æŒ‡åœ¨ DOM æ ‘ä¸­ï¼Œæ³¨å†Œäº†è¯¥ listener çš„å…ƒç´ ï¼Œæ˜¯å¦ä¼šå…ˆäºå®ƒä¸‹æ–¹çš„ä»»ä½•äº‹ä»¶ç›®æ ‡ï¼Œæ¥æ”¶åˆ°è¯¥äº‹ä»¶ã€‚æ²¿ç€ DOM æ ‘å‘ä¸Šå†’æ³¡çš„äº‹ä»¶ä¸ä¼šè§¦å‘è¢«æŒ‡å®šä¸º use captureï¼ˆä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯è®¾ä¸º trueï¼‰çš„ listenerã€‚å½“ä¸€ä¸ªå…ƒç´ åµŒå¥—äº†å¦ä¸€ä¸ªå…ƒç´ ï¼Œä¸¤ä¸ªå…ƒç´ éƒ½å¯¹åŒä¸€ä¸ªäº‹ä»¶æ³¨å†Œäº†ä¸€ä¸ªå¤„ç†å‡½æ•°æ—¶ï¼Œæ‰€å‘ç”Ÿçš„äº‹ä»¶å†’æ³¡å’Œäº‹ä»¶æ•è·æ˜¯ä¸¤ç§ä¸åŒçš„äº‹ä»¶ä¼ æ’­æ–¹å¼ã€‚äº‹ä»¶ä¼ æ’­æ¨¡å¼å†³å®šäº†å…ƒç´ ä»¥å“ªä¸ªé¡ºåºæ¥æ”¶äº‹ä»¶ã€‚è¿›ä¸€æ­¥çš„è§£é‡Šå¯ä»¥æŸ¥çœ‹ äº‹ä»¶æµ åŠ JavaScript Event order æ–‡æ¡£ã€‚ å¦‚æœæ²¡æœ‰æŒ‡å®šï¼Œ useCapture é»˜è®¤ä¸º false ã€‚

Othreeâ€‹

useCapture é€™å€‹åƒæ•¸å°±æ˜¯åœ¨æ§åˆ¶é€™æ™‚å€™å…©å€‹ click äº‹ä»¶çš„å…ˆå¾Œé †åºã€‚å¦‚æœæ˜¯ false ï¼Œé‚£å°±æœƒä½¿ç”¨ bubblingï¼Œä»–æ˜¯å¾å…§è€Œå¤–çš„æµç¨‹ï¼Œå¦‚æœæ˜¯ trueï¼Œé‚£å°±æ˜¯ captureï¼Œå’Œ bubbling ç›¸åæ˜¯ç”±å¤–è€Œå…§ã€‚capture å’Œ bubblingï¼Œå…©å€‹æª”æ¡ˆåªæœ‰å·®åœ¨æ­¤ä¸€åƒæ•¸ä¸åŒï¼Œå¯ä»¥ç™¼ç¾äº‹ä»¶çš„ç™¼ç”Ÿé †åºä¸ä¸€æ¨£äº†ã€‚

æ€»(bai)ç»“(hua)â€‹

useCapture å‚æ•°é»˜è®¤ä¸º falseï¼Œäº‹ä»¶æ‰§è¡Œé¡ºåºä¸º äº‹ä»¶å†’æ³¡ bubbling ï¼ˆç”±å†…å‘å¤–ï¼‰ï¼Œå³æœ¬ç¤ºä¾‹ä¸­é¡ºåºæ˜¯ li â†’ ulï¼›useCapture å€¼ä¸º trueï¼Œäº‹ä»¶æ‰§è¡Œé¡ºåºä¸ºäº‹ä»¶æ•æ‰ capturing ï¼ˆç”±å¤–å‘å†…ï¼‰ï¼Œå³æœ¬ç¤ºä¾‹ä¸­é¡ºåºæ˜¯ ul â†’ liã€‚

/**
 * æ ¹æ®ç›®å½•è·å–å…¥å£
 * @param  {[type]} globPath [description]

function getEntry(globPath) {
  let entries = {};
  Glob.sync(globPath).forEach(function (entry) {
    let basename = path.basename(entry, path.extname(entry)),
      pathname = path.dirname(entry);
    // js/lib/*.js ä¸ä½œä¸ºå…¥å£

      entries[pathname.split("/").splice(3).join("/") + "/" + basename] =

    }
  });
  return entries;
}

module: {

},

/**
 * æ ¹æ®ç›®å½•è·å– Html å…¥å£
 * @param  {[type]} globPath [description]
 * @return {[type]}          [description]
 */
function getEntryHtml (globPath) {
    let entries = [];
    Glob.sync(globPath).forEach(function (entry) {
        let basename = path.basename(entry, path.extname(entry)),
            pathname = path.dirname(entry),
            // @see https://github.com/kangax/html-minifier#options-quick-reference
            minifyConfig = IsDev ? '' : {
                removeComments: true,
                collapseWhitespace: true,
                minifyCSS: true,
                minifyJS: true
            };

        entries.push({
            filename: entry.split('/').splice(2).join('/'),
            template: entry,
            chunks: ['common', pathname.split('/').splice(3).join('/') + '/' + basename],
            minify: minifyConfig
        });

    });
    return entries;
}
